HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Check, check. *Ahem* Greetings, %username%! Many of you use HugsLib, and it allows to make a change log visible in-game. So here it comes, for yours and slightly mine convenience. If you don't have HugsLib, you'll not even notice any difference, so don't worry about it.
- added an option to prefer faster spoiling ingredients for cooking. I can't really tell, how it impacts performance. If you think it causes a lag, you may disable it.

- fixed an error on trying to cut stone chunks. Sorry about that; - added an option to unload an item from an inventory (to the closest stockpile, instead of dropping on the ground). Doesn't work with RPG Style (ATM), so probably most of you not gonna see that option anyway.
